thread.title: Transcript: WSJ Interview With Philadelphia Fed President Patrick Harker

author: wsjcom
title: Transcript: WSJ Interview With Philadelphia Fed President Patrick Harker

organizations.name: wsj interview with philadelphia fed president patrick harker federal reserve bank of philadelphia

text:
Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Patrick Harker spoke with Wall Street Journal reporter Nick Timiraos on Wednesday, March 28, in Philadelphia. Mr. Harker discussed his outlook on employment, inflation and the prospect of additional interest-rate increases this year, as well as his concerns about the direction of U.S. trade and fiscal policy. He also praised San Francisco Fed President John Williams, the leading candidate to become New York Fed president, and commented on the selection process. Here is a partial transcript of the interview, lightly edited for clarity and length.
